Articles.Content:
Does anyone have an updated keyboard map for the mac version?  I'm having trouble with several commands - esp. one's that use (F)unctio keys.  Macs treat F-keys differently, we also don't have an <INS> key on our keyboard.

 

Thanks.

The Wiki page was updated on the 3rd May so should be accurate for you.  It takes you through the different modifier keys for differing operating systems too and gives you advice on remapping if required 

SM

For the F-keys, the simplest solution is to go into System settings > Keyboard and check the box to change function keys to act as normal (meaning you press Fn + function key to change the volume, brightness etc.).
